last_episode_to_air.name: Moment of Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: Peyton fits in perfectly on a getaway to Shep's family farm; Priscila proves to be the perfect partner on a trip to Shep's parents' mountain house; feeling conflicted, Shep talks with his mother and is reminded to follow his heart.

name: RelationShep
overview: Shep Rose travels across the country looking for love and a committed relationship.

episodes.name: Shepspeare in Love
episodes.overview: Shep's search for his true love has taken him on a cross-country trip to meet the future Mrs. Rose. But all that glitters isn't gold, as Shep finds puppy love with a dog groomer, declares poetic justice on an unwilling guest and makes a faux pas when Landon crashes his date. But things turn around in Dallas when he falls for a beauty queen with an edge.

episodes.name: Double the Trouble
episodes.overview: Shep's combing the Lone Star State for someone to date! He kicks things off on an unusual double date. As things start to heat up at the hot springs on another date, Shep uses his escape tactics to reach the beautiful brunette.

episodes.name: Shepard Wives Club
episodes.overview: Shep invites a few ladies back to Charleston. Cameron begins her own interrogation of the ladies. After some speed dating and sightseeing, a beach party turns salty when Shep struggles to juggle five women at once.

episodes.name: The Party Crasher
episodes.overview: Shep has his hands full, so when a surprise guest shows up, the dream house turns tense. Shep handles the situation the best he can, but the combination of high stress and hot tempers builds to an explosion at a party.

episodes.name: Bye, Bye Baby
episodes.overview: Shep tries to impress Bella on their romantic date; Shep turns up the charm on a rooftop date with Priscila, treats Peyton to a baseball game and woos Kylie on a luxurious cruise.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: Peyton fits in perfectly on a getaway to Shep's family farm; Priscila proves to be the perfect partner on a trip to Shep's parents' mountain house; feeling conflicted, Shep talks with his mother and is reminded to follow his heart.
